# HDMI Output

## Shooting

Shoot photos and record movies while viewing the scene through the camera lens or on saving footage to the HDMI device.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> This feature can be used to save 4K and Full HD movies to an HDMI recorder.

## Playback

To start playback, press the camera **PLAY** button. The camera monitor turns off and pictures and movies are output to the HDMI device. Note that the camera volume controls have no effect on sounds played on the TV; use the television volume controls to adjust the volume.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> Some televisions may briefly display a black screen when movie playback begins.
